node.title: 'We've set up a small town': Thousands flocking to jamboree excited to be somewhere that's not their house
node.description: The Scouts Victoria event has been three years in the making — this pop-up town in the Macedon Ranges has its own medical centre, supermarket, water park and radio station.
node.content:
["Despite the challenges of COVID-19 measures and a heatwave, more than 7,000 children and adults are taking part in an 11-day Scouts Victoria jamboree.", "The $5.5 million event runs until January 8 at the Elmore Events Centre\u00a0north of Bendigo.", "\"We're essentially building a town the size of Kyneton in the Macedon Ranges,\" Scouts Victoria executive manager\u00a0Jon McGregor said.\u00a0", "\"It's the equivalent of 200 school camps all happening on the same site\u00a0at the same time,\u00a0so we've had to build infrastructure, including recycling, a medical centre, a radio station, nightly concerts\u00a0and lots of activities.\"", "When\u00a0it comes to food,\u00a0$1.3 million is spent on meals throughout the event, including\u00a0900 participants with modified diets. Food is trucked in daily with scout groups able to access a pop-up supermarket on site.\u00a0", "", "
There are plenty of tech-free activities including rock climbing and abseiling.(ABC Central Victoria: Sarah Lawrence)
", "For many of the school-aged participants, the event is a welcome relief after a year of heavy technology use due to online learning and lockdowns.\u00a0", "\"The vibe is amazingly positive and a little bit chaotic, but that's the fun part,\" Scouts Victoria deputy chief commissioner\u00a0Daniella Taglieri said.", "", "
Water activities have been a popular way to cool down.(ABC Central Victoria: Sarah Lawrence)
", "
COVID-prepared\u00a0
", "Organisers spent three years planning for the event which was meant to be a national jamboree for 10,000 people.", "It was not until late November, however, that they finally decided\u00a0to push ahead as a Victorian event.\u00a0", "The site was\u00a0visited by the state's Deputy Chief Health Officer last week\u00a0who reviewed the COVID safety plan.\u00a0", "\"All of our kids are in groups of six at all times, which is treated like your household contacts, and 90 per cent\u00a0of the event is outside,\" Ms Taglieri said.", "", "
The first-aid tent includes the support of therapy dog Honey, who helps calm people down.\u00a0(ABC Central Victoria: Sarah Lawrence)
", "\"Usually a jamboree is set up to manage a gastro outbreak, and some of the strategies are the same for a COVID-19 outbreak which has been really useful.\"\u00a0", "On site, there are 10 doctors, 11 nurses\u00a0a dentist and a dermatologist.\u00a0", "\"Anyone who needs to, we can rapid antigen test and we can also PCR test on site\u00a0and send it off to Bendigo or Echuca to be analysed,\" Ms Taglieri said.\u00a0", "", "
Thousands of scouts have descended on Elmore for the jamboree.\u00a0(ABC Central Victoria: Sarah Lawrence)
", "
Phones allowed for first time
", "Phones were banned at past events, but participants have been allowed to bring their mobiles.\u00a0", "\"We're in the digital era and it's time for us to catch up with that,\" Mr McGregor said.\u00a0", "\"Phones are the central point for catering and activity information;\u00a0there are also apps which are used as part of the event.\"", "", "
Despite the heat, thousands of people are camping in Elmore.(ABC Central Victoria: Sarah Lawrence)
", "
Volunteers vital
", "Mr McGregor\u00a0said without the help of more than 1,000 volunteers, the event would cost somewhere around $30 million.\u00a0", "For volunteers like Ms Taglieri, 39, who works in education, it has been a huge effort to see the jamboree come together in recent weeks.\u00a0", "\"I would have spent at least 40 hours a week doing Scouting work\u00a0on top of my day job,\" she said.", "But the dedicated volunteer said she would not have it any other way.\u00a0", "\"We've got thousands of people here having an amazing time and a safe time.\u00a0", "", "
Daniella Taglieri and Jon McGregor are relieved to see the #VicJam come together.\u00a0(ABC Central Victoria: Sarah Lawrence)
"]
